salads.title: Watermelon and chilli salad
salads.instructions: chop watermelon into chunks, and slice chilli thinly. mix

mains.title: Dhal
mains.ingredients: lentils, vegetable mix, ginger, onion, garlic, chilli, olive oil
mains.instructions:
1. cook the spices in olive oil
2. add the vegetables
3. add lentils

mains.title: mediterranean vegetables
mains.ingredients: onion, aubergine, tomato, courgette, garlic, olive oil, oregano, thyme, basil, feta-optional
mains.instructions: chop or slice vegetables, mix all apart tomatoes with oil and herbs, set on 180 in oven for 20 min. after that add the tomatoes, roast for another 10 min. serve with fresh basil and feta (optional)

desserts.title: Summer Swiss Roll with Whipped Cream
desserts.ingredients: sponge cake and whipped cream, sesonal fruits
desserts.instructions: on the flat sponge ckae smear the whipped cream, layer the sesonal fruit on top , and start to roll, using the cling film. Let it set in the fridge for at least 4 hours, tightly rolled.
